content.en: Hydrological modeling: Scientists have been exploring the potential of integrating neural network and fuzzy logic algorithms to effectively model rainfall-runoff processes. They have also been examining the advantages of artificial neural networks and neuro-fuzzy systems in continuous modeling of runoff behavior. Additionally, researchers have been investigating the applicability of various artificial intelligence techniques, such as Adaptive Neuro Fuzzy Inference System (ANFIS) and Artificial Neural Network (ANN) methods, for river flow forecasting and flood prediction. These studies aim to improve the accuracy of predicting river flow and provide valuable insights for managing water resources and mitigating the impacts of floods.
content.da: Hydrologisk modellering: Forskere har undersøgt potentialet i at integrere neurale netværk og fuzzy logic-algoritmer for effektivt at modellere nedbør-afstrømningsprocesser. De har også undersøgt fordelene ved kunstige neurale netværk og neuro-fuzzy systemer i kontinuerlig modellering af afstrømningsadfærd. Derudover har forskere undersøgt anvendeligheden af forskellige kunstige intelligens-teknikker, såsom Adaptive Neuro Fuzzy Inference System (ANFIS) og Artificial Neural Network (ANN)-metoder, til flodstrømsprognoser og oversvømmelsesforudsigelser. Disse studier har til formål at forbedre nøjagtigheden af at forudsige flodstrømme og give værdifuld indsigt i forvaltningen af vandressourcer og afbødningen af oversvømmelsespåvirkninger.
